sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { SignInUser } from '../services/Auth' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const SignIn = (props) => { let navigate = useNavigate() const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const payload = await SignInUser(formValues) setFormValues({ email: '', password: '' }) props.setUser(payload) props.toggleAuthenticated(true) navigate('/exhibit') } return (
) } export default SignIn
